title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2210.1 - Scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2210.1 - Scope

State Regulations

Notwithstanding any provision of the City Rent and

Rehabilitation Law or of these regulations, housing accommodations covered by
title YY of the New York City Administrative Code shall be subject to the City

Rent and Rehabilitation Law and these regulations as and when title YY, the

Rent Stabilization Code and regulations adopted thereunder shall
provide. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2210.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
